content: the next 8 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 11 sts drip 16 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 3 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 6 sts drip 17 chain 7 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 4 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 3 sts 9 sts drip 18 chain 5 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 2 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into each of the next 2 sts 6 sts drip 19 chain 11 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 8 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 11 sts drip 20 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 chs followed by 1 slip_stitch in each of the next 3 chs then skip a st and make 1 slip_stitch into the next st 6 sts *fasten_off and weave in the yarn tails cut two 15 cm pieces of red yarn and tie one to the ends of each side link to video https //youtu be/lmnaxplypve if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
